DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare inflammatory mediator exhale breathe condensate allergic non-allergic asthmatic patient .
DOC.brief_title: Inflammatory Markers Exhaled Breath Condensates From Asthmatic Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have diagnose asthma least 6 month enrol study 2 . Known skin prick test result aeroallergens ; either positive negative 3 . 1565 year age 1 . On oral inhaled corticosteroid within 1 month study 2 . Having asthma exacerbation 3 . Being pregnant 4 . Suffering severe systemic disease/ bad health
